about_the_game:
"Sauna Simulator" is a funny business simulator. Buy premises, equip them with a sauna stove and start earning from it!

You inherit a sauna stove and decide to open your own sauna business. You have a large area at your disposal, divided into rooms, which you can buy and put there any stove from the store.

While your business is small, you will do all the work yourself: please customers, clean the room, put firewood in the sauna stove. However, as your sauna expands, you'll be able to hire employees to take care of all the chores you don't want to do.

Customers leave feedback. If your customers don't like your sauna: poor service, dirty facilities, etc., they will definitely leave a bad review. If, on the other hand, you take complete care of your customers, they will leave you a positive rating. Based on these ratings, you will see the average rating of your sauna.

You should not forget about safety. If your stove is cheap, then it will have a high chance of catching fire. In such cases you will need fire extinguishers, which of course you can buy at the store.

Inspections. At a certain point, an inspection will come to you. The person will check the condition of the fire extinguishers, the cleanliness of the premises, etc. Inspections can be planned or unplanned. If your sauna has bad grades - unscheduled inspections will be frequent.

The game is developing now by only one person - S1NGLE.
